description: Retrieves information about a policy. This operation can be called only from the organization's management account or by a member account that is a delegated administrator.

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the policy that you want details about. You can get the ID from the  ListPolicies or  ListPoliciesForTarget operations. The regex pattern for a policy ID string requires 'p-' followed by from 8 to 128 lowercase or uppercase letters, digits, or the underscore character (_).

nested_items.name: PolicySummary
nested_items.description: A structure that contains additional details about the policy.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the policy.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the policy.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the policy.

nested_items.name: AwsManaged
nested_items.description: A boolean value that indicates whether the specified policy is an Amazon Web Services managed policy. If true, then you can attach the policy to roots, OUs, or accounts, but you cannot edit it.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The text content of the policy.
